activities: Nortek, Inc., and its wholly owned U.S. subsidiaries may process the personal data of employees and prospective employees of Nortek, Inc.’s EU subsidiaries for any and all employment-related purposes, including, but not limited to, recruitment and initiating the employment relationship; workforce management; administering compensation, payroll, and benefits; addressing various legal obligations related to the employment relationship; and to administer training.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Air Conditioning & Refrigeration Equipment - (ACR)Building Products - (BLD)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Electronics Industry Prod/Test Equipment - (EIP)
personaldata: Any personal data in electronic or paper form regarding the employees of Nortek, Inc.’s EU subsidiaries.
recoursemech: For complaints related to the processing of personal data regarding the employees of Nortek, Inc.’s EU subsidiaries, the E.U. Data Protection Authorities.
